CustomField.description: The operation that BOOMI need to perform when sync data over to incentive vendor system, such as add new record, update existing record
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ENABLE_COUNTRY: Message to enable access at a country level - Grassroots/BIEU only DISABLE_COUNTRY: Message to disable access at a country level - Grassroots/BIEU only
CustomField.label: Operation for Boomi
